channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report E-2024010439
item.description:
Report E-2024010439

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-26T15:11:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-17
  • City: PIEDMONT
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On January 17, 2024, one (1) 330-gallon tote of lactic acid was damaged in transit and released approximately two (2) gallons of product to the trailer interior. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from First Call Environmental (FCE) to remediate the impacted site. FCE personnel utilized hand tools and absorbents to remediate the lactic acid- impacted trailer to the extent practicable. Crews transferred the remaining product from the damaged tote to a new one. The damaged tote and all impacted debris were collected and containerized into one (1) 55-gallon drum and R+L personnel took possession of the waste.
